body: Hello All, I have been facing this error recently, I have attached the image of the issue. I checked the previous discussions on it but I was unable to resolve the issue. Could you tell me, what I am doing wrong? I tried updating, remove and installing the ladybug/honeybee but it is not helping me! Thank you for the help![](http://api.ning.com:80/files/nHqVmaeEGUFVLK4Fw4KeqJMsLgJvbeWjtYB3Ejm3WvYDG2mtWfO2kw*iTbL1PfBu3iHcczfsNcuihSTztMxnU-SCrnjlpz5M/epDoubt.JPG)
topic: Runtime Error: 'hb_EPFenSurface' object has no attribute 'shade material'

replies.body: This [was a mistake](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/526) which is [fixed](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/526#issuecomment-231837012)! Update honeybee and it should be fixed.
Yes.  Very sorry for not realizing such a big bug for 2 days.  Thank you for reporting.
Thank you Mostapha and Chris Mackey! analysis is running.
